summary: An ordinance relating to and creating an indebtedness in the sum of Five Hundred Forty Thousand ($540,000.00) Dollars; providing for a loan, and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable bonds therefor, in said sum,, for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of certain general municipal public improvements; providing for the levy and interest of said bonds; and creating and establishing a construction fund and a bond interest and redemption fund.
